verbs.description: [ARG0: israel] to [V: pay] [ARG2: students] [ARG3: for social media propaganda] israel has announced it will pay university students to circulate pro - israeli information on social media networks without having to identify themselves as working for the government the move was social media israel israeli government danny seaman facebook national union of israeli students daily newspaper benjamin netanyahu
